description:
The ultimate enemy has appeared before Jahy-sama!
In order to protect the shopping district that she loves, Jahy-sama decides to casts aside all pride and asks Druj to help face this enemy.
Druj then explains why she adores Jahy-sama all this much. To great detail, at that...
Of course, danger is looming all this time!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le roi démon n`a aucune pitié ?
